name: Igor B. Correa
body:
### About me
I am interested in machine learning, visualization, graphics and also games.
Currently I am a MsC candidate at University of SÃ£o Paulo.
Below are some of the things I've done.

#### Dual Radviz
This is an experiment involving radial visualization. More about it [here] (http://igorbc.github.io/dualRadviz/).
![Image of Dual Radviz](http://igorbc.github.io/dualRadviz/img/dualRadviz01.png)

#### Rendering 3D graphics with Microsoft Excel
I did this just to play around with VBA.

Here is a video of the result.
<iframe width="420" height="315"
src="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jWa0ntAhnaY">
